text: Ralph Boulton (22 July 1923 – 1992) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:1992 deaths Category:People from Grimsby Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Goole Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Ralph Boulton
